name: FetchUrlRedirects
description:
Retrieve all URL redirects with optional filters.

Use this tool to access a list of all existing URL redirects in the HubSpot CMS. You can apply filters based on creation or updated date to narrow down the results.

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Return redirects created exactly on this date. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: Only return redirects created on exactly this date.

parameters.name: created_after_date
parameters.description: Return redirects created after this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

value_schema.description: Only return redirects created after this date.

parameters.name: filter_created_before_date
parameters.description: Return redirects created before this date. Expected format: YYYY-MM-DD.

value_schema.description: Only return redirects created before this date.

parameters.name: filter_by_exact_update_date
parameters.description: Return redirects last updated on this exact date. Use a valid date format (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD).

value_schema.description: Only return redirects last updated on exactly this date.

parameters.name: filter_updated_after
parameters.description: Only include redirects updated after this specified date (ISO 8601 format).

value_schema.description: Only return redirects last updated after this date.

parameters.name: updated_before_date
parameters.description: Only return redirects last updated before this date (in YYYY-MM-DD format).

value_schema.description: Only return redirects last updated before this date.

parameters.name: sort_criteria
parameters.description: Specify fields to sort the URL redirects by. Can include multiple fields such as 'createdAt' or 'updatedAt'.

parameters.name: paging_cursor_token
parameters.description: Token for the last read resource to fetch additional results.

value_schema.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: results_per_page_limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of URL redirects to return per page. Use to control pagination.

value_schema.description: Maximum number of result per page

parameters.name: return_archived_only
parameters.description: Set to true to return only archived URL redirects, false to exclude them.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Only return redirects created on exactly this date.

value_schema.description: Only return redirects created on exactly this date.

value_schema.description: Only return redirects created after this date.

parameters.name: createdBefore

value_schema.description: Only return redirects created before this date.

parameters.name: updatedAt

value_schema.description: Only return redirects last updated on exactly this date.

parameters.name: updatedAfter
parameters.description: Only return redirects last updated after this date.

value_schema.description: Only return redirects last updated after this date.

parameters.name: updatedBefore
parameters.description: Only return redirects last updated before this date.

value_schema.description: Only return redirects last updated before this date.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

value_schema.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of result per page

value_schema.description: Maximum number of result per page

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.
